body.content:
Dearest beloved in the Lord,

May the almighty God bless you and your family, Sincerely speaking, I
physically do not know you but your contact was an act of God and why
I had to choose you are divine and I cannot question my God.
  The doctor said that i have little time to spent on earth I have
decided to hand you
over this fund but you must promise me that you will use this fund for
charity work to help the motherless babies' homes, the less
privileges, the orphanages home.

I will advise you to contact my lawyer on this below address so that
he can guide you on how you can contact the management of the bank to
process the release of the fund to your account.

Here is my lawyer contact.

HON.BARR.YOBANNA WILLIAMS
Email :  Yobbana.Chamberstogo@aircraftmail.com
Direct line +228 91-99-84(19

Please I want you to write Yobanna Chamber and inform them that I
directed you, the lawyer will guide you. My health is getting
complicated day by day; please in case I die do not forget this mail I
sent to you this date 9th  May 2021.

I may not be having the strength to be writing you every day but as
soon as you open communication inform me because the lawyer will need
a confirmation letter from me.
Extend my greetings to your family.

Thanks
May GOD guide you.
Mrs. Ella Lee

header.subject: Re: Hello, how can I help you with this?
